The flat YoY revenue performance can be attributed to stable ASP and a slight increase in wafer shipments by 2.5% QoQ. Additionally, the utilization rate decreased from 65% in the previous quarter to 58% in Q2, which could have impacted production efficiency and revenue growth.

UMC has not provided specific guidance for future quarters, but it has maintained its 2024 CapEx estimate at around $3.3 billion.
